notes.text: We now ensure that filter fields removed by adaptation are not visible again when we reload the page
We now provide an option to merge the control title and section title for custom sections
You can now use the manifest to customize the export settings of a column
We now provide support for consuming design time cards in SAP Collaboration Manager
Now we get the correct label from annotations for the filter fields where manifest settings are passed without the label property.
You can now use the Share as Card option to share the design time cards created by the card generator, if the cards are provided for an object page
You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
We now ensure that only the 'Delete' action is available in the context menu for an empty row
We now support side effects events triggered by the application server
You can now use the list report extension API to programmatically update view content and refresh its count
We now correctly apply the filter for drafts, even when the filter bar is hidden
App developers can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the object page
We've resolved an issue with the type-ahead popup that appears automatically upon initial loading
Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
Design-time cards can now be shared correctly using SAP Collaboration Manager
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
